00003 /* Closures -- A case of traceobjects (see "traceobj.h"). */
00004 
00005 #ifndef __SLIME_CLOSURE_H__
00006 #define __SLIME_CLOSURE_H__
00007 
00008 typedef struct closure_vtbl_s closure_vtbl_t;
00009 
00010 #include "traceobj.h"
00011 #include "totalorder.h"
00012 #include "modref.h"
00013 #include "codeloc.h"
00014 
00015 struct closure_vtbl_s {
00016   traceobj_vtbl_t traceobj_vtbl;
00017   closure_t* (*invk) (closure_t* closure); /* Invoke the closure */
00018   void       (*uini) (closure_t* closure); /* "Undoes" any reads */
00019 };
00020 
00021 struct closure_s {
00022   traceobj_t traceobj;
00023   uintptr_t  readmask;
00024   timestamp_t* time_start;
00025   timestamp_t* time_end;
00026 };

00028 closure_t*      closure_inst(const closure_vtbl_t* vtbl);
00029 void            closure_call(closure_t* closure);
00030 
00031 closure_vtbl_t* closure_vtbl(closure_t* closure);
00032 const char*     closure_name(closure_t* closure);
00033 timestamp_t*    closure_time_start(closure_t* closure);
00034 timestamp_t*    closure_time_end(closure_t* closure);
00035 int             closure_compare(closure_t* closure_1, closure_t* closure_2);
00036 
00037 void            closure_enqueue(closure_t* closure, read_t* read, void* new_value);
00038 void            closure_propagate(timestamp_t* start, timestamp_t* end);
00039 void            closure_kill(closure_t* closure, timestamp_t* time);
